Package lab4.data

Class GameGrid

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
lab4.data.GameGrid
public class GameGrid
extends java.util.Observable
Represents the 2-d game grid. Moves pieces and checks the win condition.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int ME  
    int OTHER  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameGrid​(int size)
    Constructor Sets the size of the playing field, the parameter sets the length of both sides of the board.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clearGrid()
    Clears the grid of pieces The whole grid array is set to 0, which represents EMPTY.
    int getLocation​(int x, int y)
    Reads a location of the grid This can return 0, 1, or 2.
    int getSize()
    Returns the size of the side of the grid.
    boolean isWinner​(int player)
    Check if a player has won.
    boolean move​(int x, int y, int player)
    Enters a move in the game grid

  • Constructor Details

    • GameGrid

      public GameGrid​(int size)
      Constructor Sets the size of the playing field, the parameter sets the length of both sides of the board.
      Parameters:
      size - The width/height of the game grid

  • Method Details

    • getLocation

      public int getLocation​(int x, int y)
      Reads a location of the grid This can return 0, 1, or 2. Which represents, EMPTY, ME, and OTHER respectively.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate
      y - The y coordinate
      Returns:
      the value of the specified location

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the size of the side of the grid.
      Returns:
      the grid size

    • move

      public boolean move​(int x, int y, int player)
      Enters a move in the game grid
      Parameters:
      x - the x position
      y - the y position
      player -
      Returns:
      true if the insertion worked, false otherwise

    • clearGrid

      public void clearGrid()
      Clears the grid of pieces The whole grid array is set to 0, which represents EMPTY.

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner​(int player)
      Check if a player has won. The win condition is that a player has as many pieces in a row as defined by final integer INROW.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check for
      Returns:
      true if player has 5 in row, false otherwise
